locations.name: Bahen 1F
locations.brief_description: You are on the first floor of the Bahen Center. There is an exit from the building to St. George street to the East.
locations.long_description: You are on the first floor of the Bahen Center. It's usually crowded at this time of the day, but today it's eerily quiet. Only a few students are studying at the table near the doors. You better not disturb them. You see something shiny on the ground -- looks like a toonie? There is an exit from the building to St. George street to the East.

locations.name: Library Study Room
locations.brief_description: You are in the library study room.
locations.long_description: You are in a quiet library study room, surrounded by neatly arranged desks and chairs. The soft hum of the air conditioner fills the air. There is an exit to the East and West

locations.name: Starbucks
locations.long_description: You are inside a Starbucks outside the library. The coffee smells good, and you hear the faint sound of baristas calling out names for orders.

locations.name: Subway
locations.brief_description: You are in a Subway restaurant
locations.long_description: You are in a Subway restaurant. The sun is shining brightly outside, and a few students are walking in and out. There seems to be a backpack on the floor at one of the tables. There is an exit from the building to the North and South

locations.name: Lost and found
locations.brief_description: You are at the lost and found
locations.long_description: You are at the lost and found.

items.name: Toonie
items.description: There is a toonie on the ground. Someone must have dropped it.

items.name: USB Drive
items.description: There is a USB Drive at a desk. Someone must have forgot it.

items.name: Laptop Charger
items.description: There is a Laptop Charger at a desk. Someone must have forgot it.

items.name: Backpack
items.description: There is a Backpack on the floor. Someone must have forgot it.

items.name: Wallet
items.description: There is a Wallet on the floor. Someone must have dropped it.
